additionalnotes.value: In patients with CrCl less than 10 mL/minute, adjust to 75%25 of normal dose. In patients with Bilirubin levels 26 to 51 umol/L administer 75%25 of dose, if Bilirubin level is 52 to 85 umol/L, administer 50%25 of dose and if Bilirubin level is greater than 80 umol/L, omit dose. MAXIMUM LIFETIME DOSES: Adult = 550 mg/m2 (normal cardiac function), 400 to 450 mg/m2 (in combination with thoracic radiation or prior anthracycline therapy). Children greater than 2 years old: 300 mg/m2 and children less than 2 years: 10 mg/m2.
